title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6218.9 - Representation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6218.9 - Representation

State Regulations
(a) Every party shall be accorded the right to appear in person or by or with
counsel, at his or her own expense. (b) Any person compelled to appear or who
voluntarily appears before a hearing officer as a witness shall be accorded the
right to be accompanied, represented and advised by counsel, at his or her own
expense. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6218.9

Adopted

New

York State Register November 10, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 45, eff. 11/10/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
